item.title: My First Post
item.description: 用rclone 挂载 a1p 版的 onedrive 成功的Rclone 配置文件 [ConfigName] type = webdav url = https://[domain-pre]-my.sharepoint.com/personal/[full-domain]/Documents vendor = sharepoint user = Your-Email pass = Your-Password URL获取 通过网页登陆Onedrive 登陆完成之后，文件管理界面复制地址栏的网址 保留https://[domain-pre]-my.sharepoint.com/personal/[full-domain]/部分 在后面加上/Documents
